title: 緊急通知-所有人及車輛請立即遠離理工一館。EMERGENCY NOTICE - All persons and vehicles are advised to stay away from Engineering Building I immediately.
author: 郭家銘
content:
分類： 行政公告
來源： 總務處 - 郭家銘 - jiaming7185@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話6302
對象： 全校教職員_全校學生
標題： 緊急通知-所有人及車輛請立即遠離理工一館。EMERGENCY NOTICE - All persons and vehicles are advised to stay away from Engineering Building I immediately.
日期： Wed, 3 Apr 2024 17:13:35 +0800
附檔： 警戒區域.jpg (381 KB)   
因0403地震造成本校理工一館失火，因火勢持續已延燒至2-3樓實驗室，且貯放有易爆炸化學藥品，火勢尚待控制，研判有爆炸之可能性，經消防局現場指揮官通知本校進行週遭（創新育成中心、理工三館）人車撤離，爰請本校師生立即遠離現場。
濃煙亦可能具毒性，非必要請勿靠近現場或下風處。(圖書館、花師教育學院及管理學院等)

警戒區域如附檔圖示

Due to a fire in the Science and Engineering Building I caused by the 0403 Earthquake, the Fire Department on-scene commander has notified the surrounding area (Incubation Center and Engineering Building III) to evacuate people and vehicles. All students and employees are requested to leave the area immediately.Smoke may also be toxic, so avoid approaching the scene or downwind areas.
